name: tfm
description: const Iota = require('@iota/core'); const iota = Iota.composeAPI({ provider: 'https://nodes.devnet.iota.org:443' }); const depth = 3; const minimumWeightMagnitude = 9; const address = 'HEQLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWORLDHELLOWOR99D'; const seed = 'PUEOTSEITFEVEWCWBTSIZM9NKRGJEIMXTULBACGFRQK9IMGICLBKW9TTEVSDQMGWKBXPVCBMMCXWMNPDX'; const message = JSON.stringify({"message": "Hello world"}); const messageInTrytes = Converter.asciiToTrytes(message); const transfers = [ {     value: 0,     address: address,     message: messageInTrytes } ]; Iota.prepareTransfers(seed, transfers)     .then(trytes => {         return iota.sendTrytes(trytes, depth, minimumWeightMagnitude);     })     .then(bundle => {         console.log(bundle[0].hash)     })     .catch(err => {         console.error(err)     });
author: Yosleidy
